text_block_list.text:
On a day off, I spotted Almond Eye training hard on 
her own by the riverbank.
choice_data_list: <size=25>(That’s... a lot of sweat... is this her peak training period?)</size>
<size=25>(That’s... a lot of sweat... maybe it’s her peak training period?)</size>

text_block_list.text:
That said, I thought she’d be taking a break soon 
and was about to just walk past, but––
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
Almond Eye
text_block_list.text:
Next. Middle-interval runs. 20 sets of 1200m, 
30-second rest...!

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: Is the break too short? But...

"50% of running time." That’s the basis of rest—
rest time, right?
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
choice_data_list: <size=31>Yes. But... in a paper I happened to read recently...</size>

text_block_list.text: And so, I briefly explain the content of that paper.

Such a theory! Less strain on the body and greater 
efficiency?
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
choice_data_list: <size=31>Exactly. That’s why you should take proper breaks.</size>

text_block_list.text:
You’re right, I understand. ...Even so, that’s an 
incredible amount of knowledge.
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye

text_block_list.text:
I do read papers regularly. But I can’t exactly keep 
up with every new one...
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
choice_data_list: <size=30>For an Umamusume, I think that’s more than enough.</size>

text_block_list.text:
Knowledge beyond textbooks is the trainer’s domain. 
An Umamusume doesn’t need to go as far as reading 
papers.
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye

text_block_list.text: —But.
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye

text_block_list.text:
But I don’t like it. I absolutely don’t want things 
to stay this way.
text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: That’s why, first, I’ll surpass you!

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: Yes, you. First, I’ll study more than you!

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text:
And I’ll become one! An Umamusume who won’t 
lose to anyone in knowledge!

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course!... is what I’d like to say.

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: Honestly, I kind of feel like "If I rest, I lose"...

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text:
I wonder how everyone else balances it? It’s a 
tough spot.

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Then, we’re good rivals!

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text:
Let’s both give it our all. —Because I absolutely 
won’t lose!
